name: A Good Turn
description:
An interactive exploration game that uncovers the story of a recluse living in an old bus in the wilderness, by discovering mundane objects as well as intimate fragments of a secluded life. Controls
  • Squeeze grip buttons to interact and pickup objects
  • Press trigger button to activate interactions on certain held objects
  • Press and hold trackpad to teleport
